backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing access control, user profiles, inquiries, WhatsApp queries, bookings, and shipment tracking with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature removals and related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with CSS variables for light/dark themes and base element rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, root div, and module script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all site sections into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/site/gallery/Gal: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: Renders an About Us section with company description and a grid of value cards using icons.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Bo: Implements a booking form with validation, submission handling, and UI for scheduling delivery pickups.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Provides a contact form with validation, inquiry submission, and WhatsApp message integration.
Empty section file with no implemented content.
Displays service coverage areas, delivery info cards, and a nationwide pickup banner.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ga: Empty section file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Renders the hero banner with headline, call-to-action buttons, stats, and a featured image.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/La: Provides a tracking number lookup to load and print shipping labels with error and not-found states.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Displays a services section with cards listing service categories, descriptions, icons, and features.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Tr: Provides a shipment tracking UI with a search form, API lookup via useTrackingInfo, and status display.
Footer with brand info, quick links, services list, contact details, and attribution.
Responsive site header with branding, navigation links, mobile menu, and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Sets up Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabelDetails.ts: Fetches label details for a tracking number using the backend actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useOneShotTimeout.ts: Runs a one-time timeout callback when triggered, preventing duplicate timers across rerenders.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBooking.ts: Submits booking data to the backend actor and invalidates booking queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Sends an inquiry to the backend actor and invalidates inquiry-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitWhatsAppQuer: Submits WhatsApp query data to the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingInfo.ts: Fetches shipment tracking info for a tracking number using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, layout utilities, and print styles.
frontend/src/lib/validation/booking.ts: Validates booking form fields for sender, receiver, locations, package details, and pickup time, returning errors and validity status.
frontend/src/lib/validation/contactInqui: Validates contact inquiry form fields for name, phone, email, and message, returning errors and validity status.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds prefilled WhatsApp messages and generates wa.me URLs with encoded message content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata including features, new requests, issues, and project configuration.
